title: Tellek Garing
author: Tellek Garing
content: Both sides are going into the match with full confidence in much as the Gunners have not been in their best performance yet this season but are yet to lose any match and sitting fourth in the English premier league and with a comprehensive win over PSV with their best-attacking display of the campaign I think they are the favorite, while spurs who sits second with 13 points from their opening five games after a dramatic win last time a trip to emirate stadium is their toughest of the season so far and will provide a good indicator of exactly where spurs are in their rebuild under the new manager.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Tellek Garing on September 22, 2023, 03:25:39 PMBoth sides are going into the match with full confidence in much as the Gunners have not been in their best performance yet this season but are yet to lose any match and sitting fourth in the English premier league and with a comprehensive win over PSV with their best-attacking display of the campaign I think they are the favorite, while spurs who sits second with 13 points from their opening five games after a dramatic win last time a trip to emirate stadium is their toughest of the season so far and will provide a good indicator of exactly where spurs are in their rebuild under the new manager.Both teams have been in their best form so far and have been fit playing just fine. We should all know that irrespective of the fact that football is a competition, there must definitely be a winner and a loser and by  chance any team can win the match come the match day.Here is my prediction;  Arsenal 2 : 1 Tottenham.

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: Tellek Garing on September 22, 2023, 03:25:39 PMBoth sides are going into the match with full confidence in much as the Gunners have not been in their best performance yet this season but are yet to lose any match and sitting fourth in the English premier league and with a comprehensive win over PSV with their best-attacking display of the campaign I think they are the favorite, while spurs who sits second with 13 points from their opening five games after a dramatic win last time a trip to emirate stadium is their toughest of the season so far and will provide a good indicator of exactly where spurs are in their rebuild under the new manager.Arsenal is a better team then Tottenham but recently Tottenham playing really great and Tottenham are gained 2nd position on premier league point table. Tottenham is now competing strongly with Man City.  But Arsenal is a very good team in the Premier League. Arsenal's position is after Man city. So no matter how well Tottenham play suddenly, it will be very difficult for them to win a match against Arsenal.  They will not be able to beat Arsenal very easily. Anyway there is already a topic to discuss about premier league by Trofo so it was not necessary to open this topicHere is the topic where you can discuss about Premier league Premier League Prediction Thread 2023/2024

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on September 22, 2023, 03:57:44 PMBoth teams have been in their best form so far and have been fit playing just fine. We should all know that irrespective of the fact that football is a competition, there must definitely be a winner and a loser and by  chance any team can win the match come the match day.There must be definitely a winner or loser? What if they played 90 minutes and the match ended as draw. Like 1:1 or 2:2. A match may not ended as draw and it may ended as draw. There are matches that can ended as no goal at all which is 0:0. Quote from: CryptSafe on September 22, 2023, 03:57:44 PMHere is my prediction;  Arsenal 2 : 1 Tottenham.I am thinking that Arsenal would win either and I am expecting goals.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on September 22, 2023, 03:57:44 PMQuote from: Tellek Garing on September 22, 2023, 03:25:39 PMBoth sides are going into the match with full confidence in much as the Gunners have not been in their best performance yet this season but are yet to lose any match and sitting fourth in the English premier league and with a comprehensive win over PSV with their best-attacking display of the campaign I think they are the favorite, while spurs who sits second with 13 points from their opening five games after a dramatic win last time a trip to emirate stadium is their toughest of the season so far and will provide a good indicator of exactly where spurs are in their rebuild under the new manager.Both teams have been in their best form so far and have been fit playing just fine. We should all know that irrespective of the fact that football is a competition, there must definitely be a winner and a loser and by  chance any team can win the match come the match day.Here is my prediction;  Arsenal 2 : 1 Tottenham.Yes, this could be a possible prediction. Arsenal is a very potential team to win. Tottenham is doing good But there are doubts whether they can win the match against Arsenal. However, Tottenham played well in the last matches and because of their good performance in the last 5 matches, they are in a better position than Arsenal in the points table. However, the match will be a tight game.  Because Tottenham's preparation is very good while Arsenal already has a very good playing record and they are considered as a good team.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: coinerer on September 22, 2023, 04:14:18 PMQuote from: CryptSafe on September 22, 2023, 03:57:44 PMQuote from: Tellek Garing on September 22, 2023, 03:25:39 PMBoth sides are going into the match with full confidence in much as the Gunners have not been in their best performance yet this season but are yet to lose any match and sitting fourth in the English premier league and with a comprehensive win over PSV with their best-attacking display of the campaign I think they are the favorite, while spurs who sits second with 13 points from their opening five games after a dramatic win last time a trip to emirate stadium is their toughest of the season so far and will provide a good indicator of exactly where spurs are in their rebuild under the new manager.Both teams have been in their best form so far and have been fit playing just fine. We should all know that irrespective of the fact that football is a competition, there must definitely be a winner and a loser and by  chance any team can win the match come the match day.Here is my prediction;  Arsenal 2 : 1 Tottenham.Yes, this could be a possible prediction. Arsenal is a very potential team to win. Tottenham is doing good But there are doubts whether they can win the match against Arsenal. However, Tottenham played well in the last matches and because of their good performance in the last 5 matches, they are in a better position than Arsenal in the points table. However, the match will be a tight game.  Because Tottenham's preparation is very good while Arsenal already has a very good playing record and they are considered as a good team.Arsenal is a good and better team compared to Tottenham. Their previous matches ended up Arsenal being victorious compared to the other.  Looking at to the comparative advantage of both teams, Arsenal is rated high in performance and actions coupled with the key players and their formation.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First, let me mention that this thread isn't supposed to be a thread for it should belong to Premier League Prediction Thread 2023/2024, but even if you still decide to make it a thread, then it should belong to the Gambling Discussion board, I've never come across matters relating to football or sports being discussed in the Gambling board, and honestly, it looks really odd discussing this here, so maybe you might want to move it to the gambling discussion board.And to contribute to the discussion, Arsenal does seem to stand a better chance of wining the game, but honestly, we can't underrate Tottenham, I mean Tottenham is one of the best club with really good and serious players I know, I do not wish Arsenal loss, but then, they must bring their A game on if they must win this one.
